column1: Anxiang County (simplified Chinese: 安乡县; traditional Chinese: 安鄉縣; pinyin: Ānxiāng Xiàn) is a county in Hunan Province
column3: it is under the administration of the prefecture-level city of Changde. The county is located on the north in Hunan Province and the southeast in Changde City
column4: it borders to the north by Gong'an County
column12: 619 of permanent resident population (as of 2010 Census). It is divided into eight towns and four townships under its jurisdiction.  The county seat is Shenliu (深柳镇).
